passives.name: Practice Makes Lethal
passives.effects: Basic attacks {{tip|on-attack}} grant {{as|{{rd|{{fd|0.4}}%|{{fd|0.2}}%}} critical strike chance}} permanently, stacking up to {{rd|63|125}} times (capped at {{as|25% critical strike chance}}).

passives.name: Flurry
passives.effects: Launching a basic attack against an enemy champion grants you {{as|30% '''bonus''' attack speed}} for 6 seconds (30 second cooldown, reduced by 1 second {{tip|on-hit}} and 2 seconds if the attack {{tip|critical strike|critically strikes}}).
